Header: Werder Bremen edge Wolfsburg in Bundesliga clash
Content: Werder Bremen moved into joint top of the table with Dortmund after a 2-0 win over Wolfsburg.Dortmund still have a game in hand, but Werder Bremen will be full of confidence staying unbeaten at home in 16 games.Davy Klaassen scored Werder Bremen’s first, just before half time with a strong strike off a rebound in the box.Substitute Claudio Pizarro combined with Johannes Eggestein who found the net for the side’s second goal, four minutes before full time.
